name: Mercado Libre @Config 2022
description: Join Ger & Facu through the challenges of migrating, upgrading and maintaining Andes UI, the design system used by one of the largest UX teams in Latin America and how it’s shaping a more system oriented design mentality across projects. They will show examples of how this “systems state of mind” can boost productivity, enable quicker iterations and make workflows more efficient overall, both for a design system’s team and for everybody involved in the design and development process.
